title: Sweden cruise into last 16 at World Cup
title_page: Sweden cruise into last 16 at World Cup - BBC Sport
maintext:
Sweden turned on the style to demolish Italy 5-0 and secure a place in the last 16 of the Women's World Cup.
The 2019 semi-finalists showed why they remain heavyweights of the women's game as Amanda Ilestedt, Fridolina Rolfo and Stina Blackstenius scored in the space of seven minutes before the interval.
It went from bad to worse for Le Azzurre when Ilestedt added the fourth from yet another corner.
Substitute Rebecka Blomqvist added the fifth in the 95th minute.
